Module JBubbleBobble2
Package BubbleBobble.designPattern

Class NormalHeroAction

java.lang.Object
BubbleBobble.designPattern.NormalHeroAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeroActionStrategy
public class NormalHeroAction extends Object implements HeroActionStrategy
Defines the normal hero actions for moving and shooting in the game. This class implements the HeroActionStrategy interface and provides behavior for a regular hero, such as movement and shooting bubbles or fire bubbles. The normal hero is able to move left, right, jump, and shoot bubbles or fire bubbles while alive and not paused.

  • Constructor Details

    • NormalHeroAction

      public NormalHeroAction()

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(Hero hero, String direction)
      Defines how the normal hero moves. The hero can move left, right, or jump depending on the direction provided. Movement is only allowed if the hero is alive, not paused, and not colliding with boundaries.
      Specified by:
      move in interface HeroActionStrategy
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero that will move.
      direction - The direction to move the hero in ("Left", "Right", "Up").

    • shootBubble

      public void shootBubble(Hero hero)
      Defines how the normal hero shoots a bubble. The hero can shoot a bubble if they are alive and not paused. The bubble is created at the hero's position, with the hero's direction.
      Specified by:
      shootBubble in interface HeroActionStrategy
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero who will shoot the bubble.

    • shootFireBubble

      public void shootFireBubble(Hero hero, int type)
      Defines how the normal hero shoots a fire bubble. The hero can shoot a fire bubble if they are alive and not paused. The fire bubble is created at the hero's position and its type is set.
      Specified by:
      shootFireBubble in interface HeroActionStrategy
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero who will shoot the fire bubble.
      type - The type of fire bubble to shoot (indicating which hero shot it).
